title: Magical Girl

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, choose magic or chocolate.
> *Magic* — Choose up to three other players. The first is roleblocked, the second can't vote the next day, and the third's defense is lowered by one stage for the night (no defense becomes Vulnerable).
> *Chocolate* — Choose up to three players. All abilities used against the first tonight fail, you get investigative results (see Post 35) for the second, and the third gets a layer of Basic defense that can block one attack. You may self-target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Once you choose a mode three times, you may no longer choose the other.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Your goal depends on which of magic or chocolate you chose more of. You can't win if it's even.
> *Magic* — Hang every criminal and evildoer.
> *Chocolate* — Live to see the Town lose the game.
